arguments.template:
<ngx-charts-chart
      [view]="[width, height]"
      [showLegend]="false">
      <svg:g
        [attr.transform]="transform"
        class="pie chart">
        <svg:g ngx-charts-pie-series
          [colors]="colors"
          [series]="results"
          [innerRadius]="innerRadius"
          [outerRadius]="outerRadius"
          [gradient]="gradient">
        </svg:g>
        <svg:text
          class="label"
          dy="-0.5em"
          x="0"
          y="5"
          text-anchor="middle">
          YYY {{ totalLabel }}
        </svg:text>
        <svg:text
          class="label percent-label"
          dy="0.5em"
          x="0"
          y="5"
          ngx-charts-count-up
          [countTo]="totalValue"
          [countSuffix]="unit"
          text-anchor="middle">
        </svg:text>
      </svg:g>
    </ngx-charts-chart>
